title: About Home Handwoven Multicolored Rag Rug for Living Room, Kitchen Floor 20"x 32"
features: MULTI - COLORED - This Handwoven Chindi Rug/Carpet is Multicolored. Each color it the rug is carefully chosen to make up a perfect looking carpet.
REVERSIBLE - This rug is reversible and can be placed on the floor from both sides.
ECO - FRIENDLY - This rug is made out of rags and therefore avoiding the wastage of cloth, so if you're using this product, you're helping us save the environment.

SEASON FRIENDLY - This rug is a season friendly rug which can be used in all seasons, inside the house in summers to prevent the floor from dust, it can be used as a picnic rug for when you go outside to have fun with your kids or friends. This rug can also be used in winters to lay on, outside in the sun whilst getting a tan.
